Off Plan | London Property  London Property Off Plan Buy-to-Let Commercial UK Mortgage Tax 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 Off Plan Property in London Off plan property investment is a convenient way to get a leveraged exposure to London property market and fix a purchase price before completion of construction. Off Plan Property: Advantages Off plan property is secured by paying 10-20% deposit before completion of construction, i.e. investors benefit from property price growth with a financial leverage: 10% property price growth on a property reserved for 10% of its price returns 100% on invested capital Off plan contract can be sold before completion of construction, i.e. within 1-3 years, or it can be completed. We can assist with mortgage, lettings and management If an off plan property is sold before completion of construction, an investor would save on stamp duty (1-7%, depending on property value) which is paid only for completed properties Off Plan Property: Risks There is no guarantee that property prices would increase before completion. This risk exists when buying any property or any asset. We source off plan property with long (2-4 years) completion dates to give investors more time to benefit from price appreciation and sufficient time to re-sell A developer may become bankrupt or do not complete a construction in time. London property investment sourcing off plan property researching and identifying projects and units with attractive price / quality points negotiating prices We do extensive research using publications of leading consultancies and development plans of local authorities to recommend areas for property investment. In selected areas, we recommend options taking into account location, quality, price, payment and legal terms. observation.reason: The website claims to offer off-plan property investment with high returns which is a common tactic used by fake shopping sites to attract customers.
